casebody.data:
Byrne et al., Appellants, v. Pediatric Associates, Inc. et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Byrne v. Pediatric Associates, Inc. (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 300.]

No. 85-838 Decided December 22, 1986. Edward V. Miller Co., L.P.A., Edward V. Miller and William A. Goldman, for appellants. Bricker & Eckler, Gerald L. Draper, Marshall L. Lemer and Richard S. Lovering, for appellee Pediatric Associates, Inc. et al. Lane, Alton & Horst, Jack R. Alton and David B. Petrel, for appellee Children’s Hospital.

*301The judgment of the court of appeals in case No. 84AP-593, pursuant to appellants’ Proposition of Law No. I, is hereby reversed on authority of Mominee v. Scherbarth (1986), 28 Ohio St. 3d 270, and the cause is remanded.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, C. Brown and Douglas, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
